features: Windblock™system shields burners for maximum heat and adjusts for various pan sizes
PerfectFlow™ technology provides consistent performance, even in extreme conditions
PerfectHeat™technology for more efficient cooking with less fuel
Instastart™ ignition for push-button, matchless lighting
11,000 BTUs per burner for a total of 22,000 BTUs cooking power
Fits one 12 in. and one 10 in. pans
2 independently adjustable burners give you precise control for 2 temperature zones
Lasts up to 1 hour on high on one 16.4 oz propane cylinder (sold separately)
Removable grate & aluminized cook-top allow for quick & simple cleanups
Large rugged latched for secure storage and transportation
Room to store full sized griddle inside stove (sold separately)
Perfect for camping, hunting, tailgating and other outdoor occasions
